mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counseling (dog_id, phone, content, is_completed, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{dogId}, #{phone}, #{content}, #{isCompleted}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.select: SELECT tc.trainer_id FROM training_course_application tca JOIN training_session ts ON tca.session_id = ts.session_id JOIN training_course tc ON ts.course_id = tc.course_id WHERE tca.dog_id = #{dogId} AND tca.is_deleted = 0 AND tca.status = 'COUNSELING_REQUIRED' ORDER BY tca.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM counseling WHERE counseling_id = #{counselingId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM counseling WHERE dog_id = #{dogId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT c.counseling_id AS counselingId, d.dog_id AS dogId, d.name AS dogName, u.name AS ownerName, d.profile_image AS dogImage, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM counseling c JOIN dog d ON c.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.user_id AND u.is_deleted = 0 WHERE c.is_completed = CASE WHEN #{completed} = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND EXISTS ( -- 해당 반려견의 소유자가 이 훈련사와 연결되어 있는지 확인 SELECT 1 FROM trainer_user tu WHERE tu.user_id = d.user_id AND tu.trainer_id = #{trainerId} AND tu.is_deleted = 0 ) ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE counseling SET content = #{content}, is_completed = CASE WHEN is_completed = 0 THEN 1 ELSE is_completed END, updated_by = #{trainerId}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE counseling_id = #{counselingId} AND is_deleted = 0;
UPDATE training_course_application SET status = 'APPLIED', updated_by = #{trainerId}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE dog_id = #{dogId} AND status = 'COUNSELING_REQUIRED' AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT c.counseling_id AS counselingId, c.dog_id AS dogId, d.name AS dogName, d.profile_image AS dogImage, c.phone AS phone, c.is_completed AS isCompleted, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content FROM counseling c JOIN dog d ON c.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 WHERE c.created_by = #{userId} AND c.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.counseling_id AS counselingId, c.dog_id AS dogId, d.name AS dogName, d.breed AS breed, d.age AS age, d.gender AS gender, d.profile_image AS dogImage, c.phone AS phone, c.is_completed AS isCompleted, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.content AS content, c.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM counseling c JOIN dog d ON c.dog_id = d.dog_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 WHERE c.counseling_id = #{counselingId} AND c.created_by = #{userId} AND c.is_deleted = 0

SELECT d.dog_id AS dogId, d.name AS dogName, d.breed AS breed, d.age AS age, d.gender AS gender, d.profile_image AS profileImage, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM counseling c WHERE c.dog_id = d.dog_id AND c.created_by = #{userId} AND c.is_deleted = 0 ) AS alreadyRequested FROM dog d WHERE d.dog_id = #{dogId} AND d.user_id = #{userId} AND d.is_deleted = 0
